oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE GROUPS ON WAVE RECORDS MEASURED ALONG SPANISH SHORES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Maron, Adolfo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Spain
wave group
wave records
wave measurement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A large amount of wave records measured at four different locations of the Spanish shores have been analysed from the point of view of wave group formation. The influence of wave climate and depth on the results is studied. The results are compared with existing theories for runs of waves, SIWEH and envelope functions. Characteristics of extreme groups are also considered.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 13
